Enjoy your time and make a memorable experience in a beautiful Niagara-On-The-Lake.


Pick your own cherries, peaches and other delicious fruits ripe right from the trees.

Bite into one of these freshly picked fruits and the amazing sweetness and juiciness will not soon leave your memories.

During the picking season we offer pick your own cherries, peaches, plums, nectarines, apples and grapes.

Read More

Pick Your Own

Cherries

Sweet cherries will be ripe in Early July

Sour cherries will be ripe in Mid July

Note: The schedule can be changed depending on the weather, please contact us or check the website the updated information before your visit.

Peaches

Peaches will be ripe in Mid August.
